text: @NYGovCuomo @NYGovCuomo I gotta say I’m an Outdoorsman in Upstate NY, I’m liking the stuff you’re doing with this state during the coronavirus, The Heroin Epidemic in Watertown.. That’s a State Emergency.. Overdoses back on the rise.
